1: The tenant shall at the termination of this agreement have to remove superstructure if any put by the tenant at his own expenses and deliver the possession to the owner in good and tenantable condition.
2: The tenant shall himself obtain the license for any business carried on by him.
3: All kinds of security arrangements insurances etc., will have to be done by the tenant if necessary.
4: The tenant shall keep good relationship with neighbors.
5: The tenant acknowledges that the premises are in good order and repair, unless otherwise indicated herein.
6: The tenant shall, at his own expense, and at all times, maintain the premises in a clean and sanitary manner, including all equipment and appliances therein.
7: The tenant shall be responsible for damages caused by his negligence and that of his family or invitees and guests.
8: The tenant shall mow, irrigate and maintain any surrounding grounds, including lawns, shrubbery and gutters, and keep the same clear of rubbish, trash, weeds or leaves if such grounds are part of the property and are available for the use of tenant.
9: The tenant shall obtain a home telephone and must supply the owner with home and work telephone numbers immediately and agrees to immediately notify the owner of any change of numbers during the term of this agreement.
10: No goods or materials of any kind or description which are combustible or would increase fire risk, shall be stored on the property. Any storage shall be at the tenant's risk and expense, owner shall not be responsible for any loss or damage.
11: The owner shall pay the property tax on the house.
12: The tenant shall not pay any advance to the premises.
13: The owner or his authorized agent shall be permitted to enter schedule premises at all reasonable hours to inspect the same for its wear and tear.
14: The tenant & owner both have retained a copy of this agreement.
15: The rent shall be increased by ____ % (____ Percent) once in every year.
16: No compensation has to be claimed by the tenant during the period of vacating his scheduled house premises.
17: The tenants expressly acknowledge and agree that this agreement is for transient occupancy of the property, and that tenants do not intend to make the property a residence or household.
18: The tenants shall dispose of all waste material generated during the rental period in a lawful manner and put the trash in the dumpsters provided during their stay.
19: No animals or pets of any kind will be brought onto the premises without the written permission of the owners.
20: The tenants shall have no more than ____ persons reside or sleep on the premises.
21: The tenants shall not create noise or disturbances likely to disturb or annoy the surrounding property owners.
22: There shall be no smoking inside the premises.
23: The property occasionally experiences outages that are beyond the control of the owner. No refunds or compensation will be given for any such outages.
24: The tenant agrees that air conditioning shall not be set below ____ degrees and heat shall not be set above ____, and that the fan setting shall be ____. Doors and windows shall be closed when either heat or air conditioning is in operation.
25: The tenants and tenants' guests shall hereby indemnify and hold harmless the owner against any and all claims of personal injury or property damage or loss arising from use of the premises regardless of the nature of the accident, injury or loss.
26: The tenants expressly recognize that any insurance for property damage or loss which the owner may maintain on the property does not cover the personal property of the tenants, and that tenants should purchase their own insurance for tenants and their guests if such coverage is desired.
27: The tenants agree to pay all reasonable costs, attorney's fees and expenses that shall be made or incurred by the owner enforcing this agreement.
28: Daily maid service is not included in the rental rate.
29: Cable TV is provided and service level has been chosen by the owner. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, or personal preferences with regard to the cable TV service.
30: The tenant shall pay for all utilities and services based on the occupancy of the premises.
31: The owner shall have full control over the supervision and management in respect of the house and the tenant shall not, in any way, interfere with the owner’s right of maintenance nor the owner shall interfere with the tenant rights of quiet & peaceful undisturbed tenancy & occupation.
32: The tenant shall not use the demised premises for any purpose other than for which it was let out.
33: Tenant shall not make any changes without written consent from the landlord.
34: The tenant shall use the premise only for residential purpose.
35: The tenant shall not sublet or sublease the portion let out to him to any third party.
36: The tenant shall not create any untoward disturbance or nuisance in the premises.
37: The tenant shall not allow any anti-social person in the premises.
38: The tenant agrees to not cause or allow any noise or activity on the premises, which might disturb the atmosphere and peace of other occupants and / or neighbors.
39: The tenant shall not keep or store any illegal inflammable article or explosives that endanger life and property.
40: The tenancy may be renewed for further period/s mutually agreed between the parties on the terms and conditions to be specified at that time.
41: The tenant will take the responsibility to keep the kitchen, bathroom drains free of things causing clogging.
42: The tenants will dispose all waste material lawfully in accordance to garbage disposal guidelines.
43: The lease shall stand automatically terminated in case the tenant fails to comply with any of the stipulated terms and conditions of this agreement.
44: The tenant shall surrender all the equipments and appliances in the premises, at the termination of the agreement in good condition as received, except normal wear and tear.
45: The costs for clogging if any shall be borne by the tenant.
